ReviewText: HTML & CSS were my first step into web development â€” clear, visual, and rewarding!
JavaScript opened the door to interactivity. Took time to grasp closures, but worth it!
I built my first API with .NET Core in just two weeks. Clean, fast, and well-documented!
Entity Framework Core saved me from writing raw SQL. Migrations are a game-changer!
React made building UIs fun! Components are intuitive, and the community is amazing.
Figma is perfect for designers and developers alike. Real-time collaboration changed how I work!
SQL is essential. Once I got the hang of JOINs, everything clicked!
Pandas made data analysis feel like magic. Cleaning data has never been this easy!
